doc.field: for all of us by friday, 00:29:09473 --> 2147483051:51:19451 but still quite windy 2147483051:51:19451 --> 4294966103:13:29430 with some rain at times. welcome to bbc news, i'm mike embley. our top stories: a fight to the death. the fears of smaller nations are heard at the madrid meeting on climate change. micronesia's president tells us
